messages.description: Usage message for the program. {0} is the program name.
messages.C:
Usage: {0} [-F sepstring] [-v assignment]... program [argument...]
       {0} [-F sepstring] -f progfile [-f progfile]... [-v assignment]... [argument...]

messages.description: Option -{0} is unrecognised.
messages.C: Option '-{0}' is not valid.

messages.description: Error whilst parsing file {0}, aborting.
messages.C: Abort: File system error whilst parsing '{0}'.

messages.description: Unexpected token {0}
messages.C: Unexpected token: '{0}'

messages.description: How to label an error.  {0} is program name, {1} file containing error, {2} line of error, {3} column of error.
We have an uncaught exception of type std::exception, {0} is the what.
messages.C: Internal error: {0}.

messages.description: We have an uncaught exception of unknown type.
messages.C: Internal error: Unknown cause.

messages.description: No program has been specified.
messages.C: No program specified.  Either specify a file via '-f program', or as the first command-line argument.

messages.description: String contains an EOF - this is not allowed.
messages.C: String is not terminated before the end of file.

messages.description: String is not terminated before the end of a line.
messages.C: String is not terminated before end of line.

messages.description: Bad escape sequence. \{0} is what was presented.
messages.C: Bad escape sequence. \{0} is not valid.

messages.description: The octal escape sequence does not fit into a character. {0} contains the number.
messages.C: Octal escape sequence '\{0}' produces a number that is too large.

messages.description: NUL character is an undefined Octal escape sequence.  {0} contains what the user wrote.
messages.C: NUL byte (\{0}) is undefined behaviour in a string.

messages.description: The number {0} is not a valid number
messages.C: Number {0} is not valid.

messages.description: The number {0} is out of range. {0} is number input (as a string).
messages.C: Number {0} is out of range.

messages.description: We expected a '}' token but instead got '{0}'
messages.C: Missing '}}'.  Found '{0}' instead.

messages.description: We expected an action, instead got '{0}'
messages.C: Expected the '{{' to start an action.  Found '{0}' instead.

messages.description: Tried to define a builtin function ({0}).  This is not allowed.
messages.C: Cannot define builtin functions - {0}.

messages.description: Expected the name of a function, instead got {0}
messages.C: Expected a function name, instead got {0}.

messages.description: Expected 'function', instead got {0}
messages.C: Expected 'function', instead got {0}.

messages.description: Expected '(', instead got {0}
messages.C: Expected '(', instead got {0}.

messages.description: Expected ')', instead got {0}
messages.C: Expected ')', instead got {0}.

messages.description: The string {0} is not a valid variable assignment on the command line.
messages.C: Expected a valid variable assignment.  {0} is not.

messages.description: Expected ';' or '\n', instead got {0}
messages.C: Expected ';' or newline at the end of a statement, instead got {0}.

messages.description: Expected an expression after the redirection.  {0} contains the redirection token, {1} contains the token we got.
messages.C: Expected an expression after the redirection operator '{0}'.  Instead got {1}.

messages.description: Expected a list to printf, didn't get one.  Instead got {0}.
messages.C: Expected a list of expressions to print.  Instead got {0}.

messages.description: Expected an expression after a comma.  Instead got {0}
messages.C: Expected an expression after a comma.  Instead got {0}.

messages.description: Expected a ')' at the end of the list.  Instead got {0}
messages.C: Expected ')' at end of the list.  Instead got {0}.

messages.description: Expected at least two items in the list
messages.C: Expected  at least two items in the list.

messages.description: Expected an expression after '$', got {0} instead.
messages.C: Expected an expression after '$', got {0} instead.

messages.description: Expected a ')' to match '(' surrounding an expression, got {0} instead.
messages.C: Expected a ')' to match '(' surrounding an expression, got {0} instead.

messages.description: Unable to cast the value {0} to a floating point number.
messages.C: Unable to cast the value '{0} to a floating point number.

messages.description: Extra characters at the end of the program, starting with {0}
messages.C: There are extra characters after the end of the program.  First extra token: {0}

messages.description: Expected an lvalue after ++ or -- (in {0}), but instead got {1}.
messages.C: Expected a variable, array, or field reference after {0}, but instead found {1}.

messages.description: Expected an expression after the power '^' operator, but instead got {0}.
messages.C: Expected an expression after '^', instead got {0}.

messages.description: Expected an expression after the power '{0}' operator, but instead got {1}.
messages.C: Expected an expression after '{0}', instead got {0}.

messages.description: Unable to cast the value {0} to a number.
messages.C: Unable to cast the value '{0}' to a number.

messages.description: Unable to cast the value {0} to a boolean.
messages.C: Unable to cast the value '{0}' to a boolean.

messages.description: Unable to cast the value {0} to a string.
messages.C: Unable to cast the value '{0}' to a string.

messages.description: Expected an expression after the comparison op '{0}' but got {1}.
messages.C: Expected an expression after '{0}' but got {1}.

messages.description: Expected an expression after the re_match op '{0}' but got {1}.
messages.C: Expected an expression after '{0}' but got {1}.

messages.description: Unable to cast the value {0} to a regular expression.
messages.C: Unable to cast the value '{0}' to a regular expression.

messages.description: Cannot nest multiple expression lists
messages.C: Cannot nest multiple expression lists.

messages.description: Expected an array name after in, instead found {0}.
messages.C: Expected an array name after 'in'.  Instead found {0}.
